N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 206.1 - Equity method of accounting for investments in subsidiaries

State Regulations

Banks and trust companies, savings banks and savings and loan
associations may report investments in subsidiaries in conformity with the
"equity method of accounting" as approved by the Accounting Principals Board of
the Amercian Institute of Certified Public Accountants, provided, however, that
once this accounting method is adopted, it shall be consistently applied and
will not be discontinued without the prior approval of the Superintendent of

Banks. Notes
